posts.post_title: WTB Sweet Caporal and Sovereign t206s!
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone! I can't believe it, but I have 5 easy to fill backs. If I do, I will be 70% done with my back run. Now I am in no rush at all, but would love to add some new backs. I really need: 

Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 30
Sovereign 150
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 (Overprint) 
Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 25

Any help would be much appreciated. Also, willing to trade :) Thank you.

I have this card available if you are interested.  Let me know.  Thanks, Bill
